thread.title: Very nice hotel with beautiful places
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel with beautiful places - Review of Hotel le Petit Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gzsigi
title: Very nice hotel with beautiful places
text:
The hotel is quite small but very beautiful and fancy and clean.
The welldesigned chair in the room was uncomfortable for longer sitting during working on my laptop at the table. I rather bought fresh pastry in a bakery at the street, not paid for the breakfast in the hotel.
The staff was very helpful, nice and polite, they fulfilled all my requests.
Room Tip: Room 303 looks to the back of other buildings, so it was totally quiet. See more room tips
